channel.title: How do you think the idea that adding censorship circumvention tools to WhonixGateway
channel.description:
Continuing the discussion from [Persistent Tor Entry Guard Relays can make you trackable Across Different Physical Locations](https://forums.whonix.org/t/persistent-tor-entry-guard-relays-can-make-you-trackable-across-different-physical-locations/2090/22):
How do you guys think about adding censorship circumvention tools to WhonixGateway?
Because,as far as I know, a lot of people in China love your project but they can't access to Tor network without the help of censorship circumvention tools.

item.title: How do you think the idea that adding censorship circumvention tools to WhonixGateway
item.dc:creator: 2xiangzi
item.description:
I’m terribly sorry for making you wait for such a long time to have my reply:(

Patrick:

For now, there is bridges:

Unfortunately, the bridges is censored, too, in China:(

Patrick:

It’s TODO. Nice to have. We don’t have a volunteer that has time to work on it.

It’s awesome to hear that there’s possibility to add censorship circumvent tools to Whonix-Gateway!
I’m terribly sorry for making you wait for such a long time to have my reply:(

Patrick:

For now, there is bridges:

Unfortunately, the bridges is censored, too, in China:(

Patrick:

It’s TODO. Nice to have. We don’t have a volunteer that has time to work on it.

It’s awesome to hear that there’s possibility to add censorship circumvent tools to Whonix-Gateway!

item.title: How do you think the idea that adding censorship circumvention tools to WhonixGateway
item.dc:creator: 2xiangzi
item.description:
Well fun facts time again:
There’re about 1 million people able to circumvent the Internet Censorship in China and nobody has been arrested for reading/watching political sensitive materials. What the CCP really cares are people who express themselves or who call on others to assemble.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you think the idea that adding censorship circumvention tools to WhonixGateway
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
For now, there is bridges:

Whonix

Bridges

Censorship Circumvention. Get around network bans. Using Whonix with (private) (obfuscated) bridges. Useful in case your Internet Service Provider (IS...

There are also others…

Whonix

Censorship Circumvention Tools

List of Censorship Circumvention Tools that may be helpful to get around network bans. Draft.

It’s TODO. Nice to have. We don’t have a volunteer that has time to work on it.

Research Circumvention Tools
https://phabricator.whonix.org/T74

Read full topic

item.title: How do you think the idea that adding censorship circumvention tools to WhonixGateway
item.dc:creator: Hiberts
item.description:
In Cina there’s another real problem, the government !
You can’t use vpn, tor, firewall, nothing …
You can’t use Facebok, Google, Youtube and so on, which in other scenario it’s usefull for stupidity of the teenagers but the problem is that milions of people can’t use nothing that doesn’t come from government, I’m talking about the developers and so on .

Read full topic
item.source: How do you think the idea that adding censorship circumvention tools to WhonixGateway

item.title: How do you think the idea that adding censorship circumvention tools to WhonixGateway
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

well, the as far as current information goes, best method for bypassing censorship, pluggable transport is already integrated. For other methodes, we have this: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Introduction so the user may choose by itself.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
